title: 08x1: Response to Motion Picture Association of America Request for Clarification of Exceptions to the Gift Rules under the Standards of Conduct
summary: The Motion Picture Association of America receives a response related to the Widely Attended Gathering exception to the gift rules and a clarification of "prohibited source" at 5 C.F.R. § 2635.204(h) of the Standards of Conduct for Employees of the Executive Branch.
